name: WISA-Multiwall
description: Pre laminated plywood with polypropylene coating with lacquered surface.
description_long: WISA-Multiwall is a high quality and elastic lining panel for end uses where a good looking surface material with high resistance is needed. WISA-Multiwall has been developed for sidewalls of vehicles such as horse trailers and linings of vans but also shop fittings and interior linings. WISA-Multiwall is an ideal decorative material for the varied needs of the transport and construction industries.

colour.name: Colour
colour.description: please choose one of the colours
